text: The 17th District of the Iowa Senate is located in southern Iowa, and is currently composed of Polk County. ==Current elected officials== Tony Bisignano is the senator currently representing the 17th District. The area of the 17th District contains two Iowa House of Representatives districts: *The 33rd District (represented by Brian Meyer) *The 34th District (represented by Bruce Hunter) The district is also located in Iowa's 3rd congressional district, which is represented by Cindy Axne. ==Past senators== The district has previously been represented by: *Joseph Welsh, 1983-1994 *Thomas Flynn, 1995-2002 *Wally Horn, 2003-2012 *Jack Hatch, 2013-2014 *Tony Bisignano, 2015-present ==See also== *Iowa General Assembly *Iowa Senate ==References== 17
title: Iowa Senate, District 17
